title: Cuddledry Hands Free Baby Bath Towel | Luxuriously Soft Bamboo & Cotton Hooded Baby Towel | Apron Towel for Safe Babies Bathtime | Perfect Newborn Gift | Pink Edging
features: The Original - British designed apron-style baby bath towel that gives confidence to lift newborns out of the bathtub in the cuddliest, most natural way possible. Less stress, more happy bath times
Hands Free - Baby towel with hood that fastens around the adult's neck, leaving both hands free to safely lift baby from the bath while keeping you dry and baby warm. Made with quick release poppers

Two Luxurious Layers - Highly absorbent and fast drying baby hooded towel, with two layers of towelling & bamboo for hypoallergenic softness. Gentle terry towel layer drys baby and the cosy velour blanket layer keeps you dry.
Eco Friendly - Oekotex accredited cotton & bamboo baby towel which stays soft after every wash.
Perfect Gift - Award-winning baby & toddler bath towel which makes bathtime with a newborn safe, simple and snug. Ideal for baby shower gifts and one of your newborn essentials. Suitable from birth
description: Product Description Recommended by midwives, maternity nurses and hundreds of thousands of parents around the world, the multi award-winning Cuddledry Hands Free Baby Bath Towel - as seen on Dragons Den - makes bathtime for babies safe and stress-free with its clever easy to use design. The Cuddledry baby & toddler towel with hood is a baby towel that attaches to the adult with a clever neckpiece, keeping you dry and allowing you to lift and wrap baby quickly and easily. Detaches simply from the parent and forms a cosy cocoon for your baby, to completely wrap and snuggle them dry. Made with super soft bamboo and cotton so it stays silky soft even after washing. Designed with TWO layers of towelling so baby stays snug and warm, making it one of your newborn baby essentials and the best quality baby towel you can buy. The Cuddledry Hands Free Baby Bath Towel is 112cm long and 75 cm wide. *This versatile hooded baby towel is suitable for use from newborn through to toddler, perfect for baby baths and swimming too. Great for baby shower gifts for new parents, these baby hooded towels are of luxurious quality. Ships in our special packaging.
